    • Constructor Detail

      • BarrelFall

        public BarrelFall(Pair<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> pos,
                  Pair<java.lang.Boolean,java.lang.Boolean> state,
                  int x_dir)
        Constructor for Barrel Fall
        Parameters:
        pos - Position to create Barrel
        x_dir - Previous direction where the barrel was rolling
        state - Current state of barrel, [M,N], M -> if it is falling, N -> if it is always falling If keep_falling is true, then fall_through will tell whether it is a fire_barrel or not
